explanation: Aggregate sentiment for BTC is positive with repeated calls for long positions, expectations of new all-time highs, and bullish macro and technical commentary. Multiple participants mention BTC dominance holding, bullish chart structure, and expectations for breakout moves above resistance. While some short-term traders discuss possible downward liquidity grabs, the dominant theme is to buy or hold long, especially after any dips. Candlestick signals on lower timeframes are seen as supportive for new long entries, and breakout confirmation above key resistance (e.g., 108k-109k) is widely anticipated.
